summary: Just a little Retexture of this epic weapon.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t like the look of the Vanilla Version and wanted it to be similar to my bow (http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2256), so I made another Retexture with GIMP.

Installation:
Open the .zip-folder and copy the files to your ..\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\textures\\weapons\\nightingale
(If it doesn\'t exist - create it!)

The Armor you can see on the pictures is from my first mod: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2023

The Enchantment-Effects come from http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1345 by Myopic.
author: Benden1985
